ygData.subject: RE: my mistmoore drum...
ygData.msgSnippet: How much does the gypsy Lute weigh?  I have a mandolin because of the weight difference.  Maybe the LoGP is very light weight? Sylly Songsynger Bard of the
ygData.messageBody:
How much does the gypsy Lute weigh? I have a mandolin because of the weight
difference. Maybe the LoGP is very light weight?

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 22st song
Selling Swords and Such
somewhere on Innoruuk

From: CYR, Thierry [mailto:tcyr@...]
Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 9:49 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] my mistmoore drum...

From: "CYR, Thierry" <tcyr@...>

But hey, im not complaining, no one died and i had my mm
drum when i was
lev21 or so. And 2 nights later my buddies bought the lute
of gypsie
princess for 5pp from a guy in the zone. Too bad it doesnt
do squat!
